articles.author: Joe Murphy
articles.title: JD Vance says crypto can help everyday Americans. Here's how many actually use it. - NBC News
articles.description: About 1 in 6 U.S. adults — 17% — have ever invested or used cryptocurrency, a number that has held steady since 2021, according to Pew Research surveys.
articles.content:
Vice President JD Vance and two of President Donald Trumps sons were in Las Vegas on Wednesday to talk about cryptocurrencies and how the financial instrument can help ordinary people.
Vance told at… [+1842 chars]
